name: Cursed Castilla (Maldita Castilla EX)
description: Cursed Castilla (Maldita Castilla EX) is an arcade action platformer full of creatures from medieval myths from Spain and the rest of Europe, as well as from chivalric romances. This game is an extended version of the renowned classic arcade Maldita Castilla, originally created by the indie Locomalito.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 o 10 Processor: 1GHz+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Did you like Ghost'n Goblins? Or Gouls'n Ghosts?  You will like this game.
Essentially a Ghosts n Goblins clone. And it's fantastic all the same. ^_^
Here in Kaleidogames we love arcade games. This is one of them. Get it now!
